name: Lenikos Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this is a wonderful place in an ideal setting. Stayed in what is called a room, but is in fact a home with all you can think of. And a swimming pool (they have 3) under your balcony.
reviews.title: home away from home

reviews.text: The location is perfect with a view of the sea, 10 minutes drive from the village on the sea, bars
reviews.title: relax and enjoy the view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: restaurants,shops . The convenience of civilization without the noise.
reviews.title: Southern comfort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Eva, the owner knows everything about the area and will gladly advise on possible trips.
reviews.title: excellent choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Very distinguished

description: At the top of Agia Galini, in an enchanting, verdurous location, an idyllic setting of 10,000 square meters, among olive trees and gardens of unique flowers, scents and colors, the touristic resort LENIKOS offers the nature lover, moments of serenity, relaxation, rest and casualness all year round, providing all comforts and facilities for your holidays.
